inclusion.criterion: Type 2 diabetes for at least 6 months
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Diagnosis of Paget's Disease of Bone was confirmed

inclusion.criterion: Taking 1 or more oral hypoglycemic agents
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Patient attending your community pharmacy where you decided that addition of insulin glargine may be of benefit to the patient
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: The diagnosis of Paget's Disease of Bone was confirmed and  Bisphosphonate will be started as first-line therapy.

exclusion.criterion: Have used, or currently using, Insulin
exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: The diagnosis of Paget's Disease of Bone was confirmed and  Bisphosphonate will be started as first-line therapy.

exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: The patient is a 60 year old man

exclusion.criterion: Renal impairment(Serum Creatinine: females ≥ 124 mmol/l, males ≥ 133 mmol/l)
exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: His serum alkaline phosphatase is 300 IU/L

exclusion.criterion: Unwilling/unable to attend follow up visits
exclusion.label: met

notes: The patient has Paget's Disease of Bone and is starting Bisphosphonate therapy.
